channel.title: Some Bands I Like
channel.description: A list of some bands I like (or have been a member of).

item.title: Rocking Webmonkey Garage Band
item.description: The best ever garage band on the Internet.

media:content.media:title: The Webmonkey Band "Monkey Rock"
media:content.media:description: See Rocking Webmonkey Garage Band playing our classic song "Monkey Rock" to a sold-out audience at the Fillmore Auditorium.
